Text:
N-N-N-N-No chance of us getting caught here and
expelled from the academy!
I-I-I-It was worth risking our lives to come here!
When will we ever grow up?!
It's over! We're done for! I'm gonna die a virgin!

Screw this! The only woman I've ever kissed is my
mom!
Skel! Your virginity won't be forgotten!
Hey, wait! Don't you dare abandon me!
How long will this go on?
Can't a girl just wallow peacefully in her misery...

She hears a noise coming from the entrance to her
room.

Who is it? I'm not seeing any more customers
today—

Marie shrinks back only to find herself cornered
against the wall.

The ghoul bares its sharp fangs and pounces toward
her.
In that moment, she realizes she is going to die.

Suddenly, a man in a long ebony coat swoops in and
bisects the ghoul in front of her eyes.
If you want to live, then flee.
The Red Moon... There isn't much time left.

My name is Shadow... I lurk in the darkness and hunt
down shadows...

If you want to live, then flee. The rampage is
starting.
There is no sign of Shadow.
The Red Moon... There isn't much time left...
For some reason, the moon has been red as of late.

Marie had thought it strange, but none of her
fellow red-light district ladies had paid much
attention to it.

The moon being red doesn't change anything...
Or so they'd all thought.
Marie! Marie, are you okay?! There's a ghoul outside—

He's some big-time villain who attacked a school,
blew up the Sanctuary, and has been tormenting
that miserable church!
He's as big a villain as our three rulers!

You're trying to escape?! If they catch you,
you won't get off easy!

Determined to one day repay Shadow's kindness,
Marie decides to take advantage of the commotion
and escape.
Go on then, try and run...
Who knows? Maybe you'll be one of the lucky ones.
Not that you can ever truly escape your past—
The vampires have unleashed ghouls in the city!
